short_summary: Permanent sea lamprey trap installation at the Neebing River Weir.
description: The Sea Lamprey Control Centre requires construction services to install a prefabricated sea lamprey trap and peripheral components at the Neebing River Weir, located in Thunder Bay, Ontario.
tags: Construction of a prefabricated sea lamprey trap and peripheral components
Install a prefabricated permanent sea lamprey trap at the Neebing River Weir
Construction and installation of buildings and structures
full_summary:
### [English]
**Tender Title:** Permanental Sea Lamprey Trap Installation at Neebing River Weir
**Reference Number:** CB-765-44557702-3
**Solicitation Number:** 30004137A
**Publish Date:** February 6, 2024
**Closing Date:** February 22, 2024, 2 pm EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** March 26, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** September 25, 2024
**Procurement Category:** CNST
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Notice URL:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31367/30004137a---rfq.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31367/30004137a---rfq.pdf)

The Sea Lamprey Control Centre, part of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO-SLCC), invites bids for the construction services required to install a prefabricated permanent sea lamprey trap and appurtenant components at the Neebing River Weir, Thunder Bay, Ontario.

The project objective is to install a prefabricated permanent sea lamprey trap at the Neebing River Weir along with its appurtenant components (access stairway, handrailings, water intake screen, water intake valve, and locking trap lid) as shown in the construction drawings. The project is part of the DFO-SLCC’s efforts to control and study sea lamprey, an invasive species infesting the Great Lakes.

The bid will be evaluated in two phases: the first phase will pre-qualify bidders based on mandatory requirements; the second phase will invite pre-qualified bidders to provide a financial bid on the project.

### [French]
**Titre de l'appel d'offres:** Installation de pièges permanents à lamproie de mer au déversoir de la rivière Neebing
**Numéro de référence:** CB-765-44557702-3
**Numéro de sollicitation:** 30004137A
**Date de publication:** 6 février 2024
**Date de clôture:** 22 février 2024, 14h HE
**Date de début prévue du contrat:** 26
